create.title: Request credit facility
create.intro: To pay on account as a business customer, you need to request a credit limit. For this purpose, we require a few more pieces of information from you.

messages.no-existing-b2b-address: Before you can request a credit facility with Tilta, you need to create a business billing address first.
messages.address-does-not-exist: The requested address does not exist.
messages.no-country-can-not-be-changed: The country of this address cannot be changed as you already have a credit limit (with Tilta). Please create a new address if needed.

facility.unknown-error: An unknown error occurred while requesting the credit facility. Please contact customer service for assistance.
facility.created-successfully: The credit facility has been created successful.

checkout.facility-exceeded: Your credit limit is currently reached. Please settle any outstanding invoices before placing another order on account. If you have any questions or need assistance, our customer service is here to help.
checkout.facility-too-low: Your credit limit does not currently cover the total of this order. Please review and adjust your order or payment method accordingly. If you have any questions or require assistance, please contact our customer service.

checkout.title: Tilta Invoice
checkout.informationAboutDuration: After we have shipped your order, you have a period of %duration days to settle the outstanding amount.

buyerRegistration.intro: For utilizing this payment method, please request a credit availability limit from the payment service provider Tilta Fintech GmbH. Once approved, you can continue with your order.
